Posts.Content: BUTTERFLYBONNIE wrote:  ORGINALLY IN BREAST, TO BONE AND NOW TO MY LIVER.    TOOK  RADIATION TO THE BONE, FEMARRA , ZOMETTA, AND NOW ON A TREATMENT OF A/C....ADRIAMYCIN & CYTOXAN.  HAD ONE TREATMENT AND CANCER MARKER WENT FROM A 68 TO 169, LIVER ENZYMES ALL OFF, AND GOT BILIRUBIN.  TOOK SECOND TREATMENT YESTERDAY AND GOT 1/2 OF THE DOSE OF A/C TO SEE IF MY LIVER WOULD TOLERATE IT BETTER, DR. WASNT TOO SURE THIS TREATMENT WOULD WORK. BUT ALSO WANTS TO LOOK AT ANOTHER CANCER MARKER BEFORE ANY DECISION ON CHANGING TREATMENT.  ANY ONE ELSE HAVE THIS EXPERIENCE????? AND AM I NOW DOMMED?  I AM SO VERY WORRIED THAT NO TREATMENT WILL WORK NOW.  HE  DID SAY 2 MORE OUT THERE TO TRY.  WOULD APPRECIATE ANY COMMENTS OR SUGGESTIONS CAUSE YOU LADIES ALL ROCK........... 'HAPPY MOTHERS DAY' TO ALL.................. &  PRAYERS. Dx 2/2009, Stage IV, mets, ER+ Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: BUTTERFLYBONNIE wrote:  I WAS TAKING FEMARA AND WENT INTO A REMISSION FOR 6 MONTHS, AFTER MY CANCER MARKERS STARTED TO CLIMB - -A 15 TO A 40 TO A 67, DR. ORDERED A PET SCAN.  I HAVE NOW MORE BONE METS AND NOW LIVER METS.  HE IS PUTTING ME ON 2 CHEMO DRUGS.ONE IS ADRIAMYCIN, WHICH CAN CAUSE CONGESTIVE HEART FAILURE, SO I HAVE TO TAKE A MUGA TEST BEFOR I START THIS ONE, AND THE OTHER DRUG IS CYTOXAN.  I HAVE BEEN CHECKING THE BOARDS AND CANT SEE ANYONE WHO WAS ONE THESE DRUGS...........PLEASE HELP ME, AS I AM AFRAID TO TAKE THEM..  I KNOW I HAVE TO AND MY DR SEEMS TO THINK THEY WILL BE ABLE TO PUT ME INTO ANOTHER REMISSION, YET I WOULD LIKE TO HEAR FROM SOMEONE WHO MAY HAVE TOOK THEM.    THANKS......... Posts.Content: BUTTERFLYBONNIE wrote: I HAVE STAGE IV BREAST CANCER WITH BONE METS.  TOOK 6 DOES OF A CHEMO TREATMENT, AND WENT INTO A 6 MONTH REMISSION.  CANCER MARKER STARTED TO CLIMB AND I TOOK A PET SCAN. IT SHOWED LIVER CANCER.  SO WE STARTED A TREATMENT OF ADRIAMYCIN & CYTOXAN, AND I CONTINUED THE ZOMETTA.  PLUS A SHOT OF NEULASTA.  TODAY'S DR VISIT HE SAYS I HAVE BILIRUBIN AND AT THE NEST CHEMO WE WILL LOWER THE DOSAGE.  THEN I GOT TO THINKIN, DOES A LOWER DOSAGE STILL FIGHT THE CANCER?  CAN YOU GET RID OF BILIRUBIN?  HAS ANYONE BEEN HERE??????  GETTING WORRIED NOW THAT I WILL NOT BE ABLE TO FIGHT THE LIVER CANCER.   ANY COMENTS WILL BE APPRECIATED.   THANKS IN ADVANCE. BUTTERLY Dx 2/2009, Stage IV, mets, ER+ Log in to post a reply
